name: Carrie | Eat, Drink & Be Carrie
bio: The Art of Living by Carrie | Owner #carriescarriagehouse | Featured on: HGTV, ELLE Québec, Clin d’œil | Montreal, 🇨🇦

social_posts.post_text:
A few weeks ago, I was wined and dined by @mirepoixmangetout at a luxury chalet in the Laurentians. Mirepoix is an incredible at-home chef that you can hire for your next gourmet event with friends, family or clients. I had the most memorable meal and the couple that makes up Mirepoix, Jules and Jasmine are absolutely lovely. From A-Z, they think of everything, including bringing their own tableware and all the ingredients for a perfectly unforgettable meal. A delight for the palate as well as a feast for the eye, Chef Jules has a talent that you need to experience! Without forgetting the perfect wine pairings, this duo does it all (even the cleaning up). All that’s left up to you is the location and the guest list. Give them a shout to help host the next fancy dinner at your chalet or home in the Laurentians. They are based in Morin-Heights but will even travel to Montreal if need be. I can’t recommend them enough. More about the gourmet meal with Mirepoix on my blog. 
#mirepoixmangetout #chefadomicile #athomechef #privatechefservice #mirepoix 

Hosted at @fiddler_lake_resort 🛏️
(Media Invite)
Cover photo: @patriciabrochuphotographe 🫶🏻

Me and @dapperschnauzer because I just love this portrait of us by @marisaportolese (taken a few years ago). A lot has changed since then, but the one true constant is my furry faithful side-kick. I really don’t know what I’d do without him! #portraitwithdog #womansbestfriend #dapperschnauzer

Happy Earth Day! I can’t wait to plant my garden but we all know that there’s usually one last snow fall at the very end of April. I learned the hard way and lost a bunch of hydrangea one year. How will you be celebrating? Will you ditch the car today? Let’s try and do something sustainable! 🍃🌳🫶🏻🍃🌲🪴#earthday2023 #gardenstyle #myenglishgarden

Nothing quite like a swinging skirt! I bought this Issey Miyake Pleats Please harlequin skirt ages ago at auction, but it’s still one of the most favourite pieces I own. It’s got swing and bounce and an elastic waist to boot. I picked it up for a song and saw a dress in the same pattern on 1stDIBS going for over 3K! Shopping second hand does not mean that you have to sacrifice luxury. Not only is it sustainable - it ensures you’ll have a unique style that’s almost  impossible to copy. My two cents of the day! #pleatsplease #shopvintagefashion

Here’s an easy recipe for “Quiche Leekraine” that I found on the @jamieoliver website. I converted the ingredients into cups for us Canadians: 
1 cup of sautéed leeks (sautéed in olive oil)
3 eggs
3/4 cup of grated cheddar 
1 cup of milk
1/2 cup of lardons (I used @fumoirsgosselin 😋)
1 pie crust (recipe says to pre bake but I didn’t 🤷🏼‍♀️)
Salt & pepper
Mix & pour all the ingredients into the pie crust and bake for 30mins at 350F - serve with salad & wine😁 I forgot how good a homemade quiche tastes! Way better than store-bought. I made two so that I could freeze one for when I don’t feel like cooking. Enjoy! Let me know if you try this one. 

#budgetfriendlymeals #quicherecipe #quichelorraine #jamieoliver #jamieoliverrecipe

Nothing but the best for Montreal! Tonight was the official opening or re-opening of @voguehotelmontreal complete with the best of both @cafebazin & @yamaresto by @chefantoniopark Make sure to add these places to your list of restaurants to visit in Montreal soon😋 #cafebazin #yamarestaurant #chefantoniopark #mtlresto

Tonight’s outfit is approved by @dapperschnauzer although I’m sure he wishes that I would stay home. 

Dress: vintage, probably from the 80s
Scarf: Givenchy, from an estate sale
Belt: thrifted from an estate sale 
Heels: Zara 

Outfit of the night, evening look, all black, little black dress, montreal style, thrifted style, see through dress, what I wore, my vintage style, 🖤

Celebrated the coronation of King Charles III today with a very early afternoon tea (served at 6am at @burgundylion !) but if was worth getting up at 4am for this very special occasion. I know not everyone is a fan of the monarchy but I love the traditions, the pageantry and all the glorious music that was performed throughout the coronation. It’s something many people only witness once in their lifetime and to me it was important not to miss it. 👑 #coronationday #kingcharlesiii #britishmonarchy #coronation2023 #coronationcelebration

I ordered this suit when Zara launched its website in Quebec at the beginning of 2013. Since then, I can’t count the number of times I’ve worn it, but I know for sure that I wore it that year to land a job interview and to the very first Grand Prix party at the Ritz. Many years and many events later, I was considering retiring my beloved hot pink suit but it still brings me joy (even if it’s shrunk in my closet over the years 😅)! Luckily, my friend @isabelle.lafleche asked if we could take a photo together wearing our pink suits to celebrate their 10th anniversary and the fact that, by wearing them over and over for the past 10 years, they’ve gone from fast fashion to sustainable. I don’t shop these big box stores often but when I do, I try to pick pieces that I love and will wear often. Now, do you think I should donate it or keep it? 💞

#hotpinksuit #sustainabilty #makeitsustainable #styleover50

Finally! This is the week to get your garden in. I always love planting my little pizza slice of a garden. Not only does it make me happy, the neighbours and passersby enjoy it too. Although, I’ve decided against planters on the steps this time around since I had plants stolen three times in a row last fall 🤷🏼‍♀️ These new flowers can be enjoyed from beyond the locked fence 🙅🏼‍♀️ Thank you!🤞🏻 #mytinygarden 

Gardening, garden life, small gardens, English garden, urban garden, spring planting, impatients, garden urns, garden statue

Last Thursday @restaurantlerichmond for their terrace opening and launch of their new summer menu during #SOHOThursdays with live jazz by @shaharah_sinclair 😎 The sun was out and the evening was made extra special thanks to @selectaperitivo 🍹! The new menu was delicious and it was so lovely to be dining outside with live music. Be sure to check it out every Thursday! 
#ExperienceLeRichmond 

Thanks for inviting me @ee_mtl & @luc.laroch And for the lovely gift @markanthonyqc ❤️ #selectaperitivo #mtlresto #mtlrestaurant #mtlrestaurants

Just like Paris! I’ve been dying to try lunch on the terrace at @chezleveque1972 and it was a wonderful French dining experience. My friend @bernardcordeau and I decided to stop by after shopping up a storm at an estate sale. I had the seasonal asparagus in cream and the “Dorade Royale flambée au pastis” (Royal sea bream flambéed with pastis) which was divine. We ate so well that there was sadly no room for dessert, but that only means we will have to return. Chez Lévêque opened the year I was born, 1972 - it’s so nice to see this French institution on Laurier Ouest still alive and well. Je souhaite une longue vie à cette brasserie parisienne à Montréal ! 🇫🇷 

#brasserieparisienne #brasserie #frenchbrasserie #mtlresto #mtlrestaurant

Got the real big cougar energy 🐆 Another estate sale look that I’m very happy with! 

Skirt: Tahari 
Cardigan: unknown label
Heels: YSL

Outfit of the day, it’s a slay, leopard print, leopard print skirt, leopard is a neutral, leopard on leopard, mixed prints, my vintage finds, second hand luxury 🤎 #leopardprinteverything #leopardprinteverything #styleover50 #fabover50

Tonight @waverlymtl officially reopens and they sent me the sweetest package to kick off the festivities: a pre-drink Daiquiri to mix at home (made with local spiced rum from @distilleriedemontreal ), complete with a playlist to get me in the mood for the soirée! The invite and box were designed by local artist @cavi.art 🎨 Such a great idea that I really appreciated! See you soon at Bar Waverly! #montrealbar #mixologie #daiquiri

So many elegant hotels have opened or re-opened in May 2023! I was happy to get a first look at @honeyrosemontreal - the brand new Art Deco inspired boutique hotel in the Quartier des Spectacles, the newly renovated @voguehotelmontreal and the iconic @marriottchateauchamplain which also had a total revamping of its interiors. Read about the highlights of each hotel and why you should check them out even if you’re not checking in! (Link in my bio) #honeyrosehotel #hotelstyle #montrealhotels #chateauchamplain

This afternoon I had the pleasure of attending an exclusive media tasting of La Grande Dame 2015 with Cellar Master @didier_mariotti of @veuveclicquot Hosted at @hiatusmontreal - the new high-end dining experience on the 45th floor of @placevillemarie scheduled to open in the coming weeks. What a view! Watch for #lagrandedame 2015 coming to Montreal this fall.🥂 #veuveclicquot #champagnetasting

Our Sunday best - @dapperschnauzer is sporting his new velvet bow tie from @pooshimtl & @mondou_calin (a gift for him, but they are available at select Mondou shops) and I’m wearing all vintage finds from estate sales, except the shoes. Happy Sunday! #sundaybest #sundaystyle #meandmydog

Spent the day @vignobleriviereduchene with @dansunjardin for the launch of their new skincare line. Made with natural ingredients inspired by nature, I’m looking forward to trying them on my sensitive skin! #dansunjardin (Media Invite) #vignoble #vignobleduquebec #naturalskincareroutine

Last night I had a sneak peek at the new Moishes Montreal @moishesmontreal at Square Victoria - the martinis are still on point and if the small bites they served at the pre-opening are an indication of what’s to be expected of the food, I can’t wait to return. I’ve missed their mouth-watering steaks! So glad that this Montreal institution is back and I wish them all the best in their new location! (Media Invite) #mtlresto #mtlsteakhouse #mtlrestaurant #montrealrestaurant

The last couple of weeks have been very exciting for Montreal events and as I get ready for a busy Grand Prix weekend, I’m looking back at all these lovely moments which brought me so much joy… maybe they’ll inspire you for your weekend or summer celebrations! 

Photos 1&2: The opening of the @renoirmontreal terrace with plenty of #veuveclicquot & delicious seafood 🥂🦪

Photos 3&4: at a tasting of @veuveclicquot La Grande Dame at the new HIATUS restaurant with the best views of Montreal @hiatusmontreal 

Photos 5&6: Getting ready for and at the South African @le_bonheur_wines wine tasting at @warwicklecrystal 

Photo 7: a day at @vignobleriviereduchene with @dansunjardin for the launch of their new skincare line 

Photo 8: at the opening of the new @moishesmontreal at Square Victoria in the Quartier International. 🍸🥩

Photos 9 & 10: last night, at a lovely @vinsdechablis tasting at @restaurantbivouac - with incredible views on the Quartier des Spectacles 🍇🎵 

#mtlmoments #grandprixweekend #sofitelmontreal

Sushi lovers will be thrilled to try this mind-blowing Omakase experience in Griffintown. Located inside @stillifemtl - Sushi by Scratch takes nigiri to the next level during a 17-course dance with beverage (sake, cocktails and even beer) pairings. Prepare to have your mind blown! Only three seatings each evening and only 10 people at a time. A culinary journey like no other! Thank you for having me @sushibyscratchrestaurants 🍣🫶🏻 

Montreal fine-dining, hidden speakeasy, Michelin-starred ⭐️

Last night’s red carpet gala at @restaurantlerichmond was full of good energy and fun people. I was dressed by @smail_akdim_couture 🫶🏻 That’s a wrap for this year’s Grand Prix events for me! Thanks for the invite! 🥂🏁 Pirelli party 🏎️ 

👗: @smail_akdim_couture 
👡: @aldo_shoes 
🥂: @champagnelanson 

#PIRELLI #FIT4F1 #POWERISNOTHINGWITHOUTCONTROL #experiencelerichmond #lerichmondmtl #restaurantlerichmond #GPatlerichmond #griffintown #montreal #quartierducanal #grandprixducanada #F1 @pirelli

A suit is always a great investment - I get so much wear out of mine that it was about  time I picked up a new one. They don’t even have to BE expensive to LOOK expensive! Scroll to see my latest suit purchase. 

Case in point: 
1. My red suit from @lechateau (purchased in 2020 just before the co. closed all its stores with gift cards given to me by the brand)
2. My hot pink Zara suit 
(Purchased in 2013 when they launched their e-commerce site in Quebec - also with a gift card from the brand) 
3. My new neon pink suit purchased last week at Zara (with heels to match)
Do you also love a woman in a suit? I think it’s a great option to make one feel confident and comfortable at the same time. 

Women’s suits, style over 50, 50 and fab, 50 plus style, ladies suit, #montrealfashion #suituplife

Fun souvenir from the Red Carpet Gala at @restaurantlerichmond with @pirelli 

Dress by @smail_akdim_couture 👗
👡: @aldo_shoes 

#PIRELLI #FIT4F1 #POWERISNOTHINGWITHOUTCONTROL  #experiencelerichmond #lerichmondmtl #restaurantlerichmond #GPatlerichmond #griffintown  #quartierducanal #grandprixducanada #F1 # @pirelli #grandprixmtl

Bonne Saint-Jean to my fellow Québécois(es)! ⚜️ I may not always celebrate the holiday but I consider myself fortunate to call Quebec home for the past 22 (almost 23 years!) - even if I still get “Mais vous parlez très bien le français pour un anglophone!” on occasion, most of my experiences living here have been positive ones. I do speak French pretty well for an Anglo and I am proud that I was afforded many wonderful opportunities to work and live in a francophone province. It has enriched my life and I am so grateful for the many friends I have made here. Cheers to you, gens du pays! 🥂💙🤍⚜️

#fetenationaleduquebec #stjeanbaptiste #bonnestjean

House update: Our house still hasn’t sold and if it hasn’t sold by Friday, we plan on taking it off the market. It’s been a bit stressful for many reasons, some of them personal. I had hoped to take a year off to travel for my 50th, but that would have meant selling the house in order to do so. Tbh, I’m not mad about it - I tend to go with the flow and I DO love this house! And you know what Lennon said, “Life is what happens when you’re busy making other plans.” I trust in the process and believe that the universe just has other ideas for me right now. #carriescarriagehouse #carriagehouse #coachhouse #smallhouse #smallhomes #montrealhomes

All packed and ready to go! Can you guess where I’m off to? It’s an 8hr flight so I wore this pant and tunic set that I’ve had for quite a few years because it’s almost like pyjamas. And socks with Birkenstocks so I can easily slip in and out of my shoes when needed (or required). Plus, I never wear makeup on a long flight because my skin can’t hack it. Lots of moisturizer in my @bugattibags (gifted) tote to stay hydrated, plus a sleep mask and ear plugs. It’s a 10-day trip and I’m happy that I managed to only take a carry-on. Travel is a privilege and it’s always easier when we travel smart. I’ll share my destination tomorrow! ✈️🧳 But first, one last walk with @dapperschnauzer (who will not be travelling with me)! 🐕‍🦺👒

#traveloutfit #travellook #travellight #travellinglife #carryononly #travellinglifestyle  #travellingstyle #bugattibags

Happy Canada Day from Italy! 😁 A little photo dump of my first 2 days here in Ronciglione, Italy. 🇮🇹 

Villa Lina, Pool time, Italian vacation, Being a tourist #ronciglione #villalina #villalife

La Dolce Vita at @relaisvillalina 🏰 A true nature-lovers  paradise in Ronciglione, full of secret gardens and little hideaways. I’m here with friends, but the estate offers wellness retreats, foraging and plant therapy and can even host weddings. The grounds are so stunning, and it’s only an hour from Rome! #italiandestination #ronciglione #villalina #greenhousegoals

Last week, I went to the #GrandEncounter, a very intimate dining experience with Grand Marnier. We tried some delicious cocktails made with this elevated orange liquor. We even made our own #GrandMargarita, an elegant version of this classic cocktail thanks to the rich and complex orange flavours and cognac that you find in Grand Marnier. The cocktails were paired with a generous meal and ended with a spectacular flambéed baked Alaska and more Grand Marnier! @grandmarnierofficial #Ad #drinkresponsibly
One day I’ll have a greenhouse as gorgeous as this one @relaisvillalina ! Apparently it was built in 1890. #villalina  #greenhousegoals #greenhouses #greenhouselove

A perfect day in Rome: get up early, start with coffee then hit these monuments: 

1. Villa Borghese
2. Trevi fountain
3. Victor Emmanuel II monument 
4. Colosseum
5. Castel Sant’Angelo 
(There are plenty of ruins along the way!)

You’ll be done by noon and then it’s time for lunch. I enjoyed a spritz at a bar, followed by a delicious lunch at @ilmarcheseroma (their cocktails are too good! And their cacio e pepe was divino. 

Have you been to Rome? Which monuments have you visited? Let me know what I shouldn’t miss! 

#visitrome #romeitaly #romecity #colosseoroma #trevifountain #castelsantangelo #ilmarcheseroma #visitroma #romanvacation #ilmarcheseroma

Some of my favourite memories from Rome. Do you ever get the post-vacation blues? I got back on Saturday but have been sulking ever since. It’s not jet lag, but nostalgia for a time of little stress and a lot of gelato! I don’t miss the sweltering heat but I do miss the carefree days of roaming around Rome. I’m so grateful that I got to see a lot more of the “Eternal City” this time around and that I was able to enjoy it with good friends. I’ll see you again, Roma! Ci rivediamo! 

#romanholiday #romecity #romesights #visitrome #romanvacation #romeitaly

The sun is back today! Perfect for a light picnic with a little rosé. @dandurandwinespirits sent me the new Fonte Vinho Verde Rosé from @aveledawines - it’s floral and fruity with fresh notes of raspberries. It’s also slightly effervescent like most vinho verdes. (Gifted Product) 

#pinkpicnic #rosewine #roséwine #vinhoverde #roseallday #rosepicnic #vintagepicnic

Happy Saturday! I felt like this pic just needs to live on my feed because who doesn’t love bagels and puppies? Shot outside @stviateurbagel in June during a tour of Montreal I gave to some visiting journalists. #stviateurbagel #montreal #mtlmoments #bagelshop #montrealbagels

This is a little juvenile saw-whet owl 🦉 that my friend and I found injured on Dr.Penfield yesterday. He was still there in the evening so I rescued him and brought him home for the night. He seems to be recovering well and a volunteer is picking him up soon to take him to the university veterinary hospital in St-Hyacinth. I’ve never seen such a small and adorable creature! I feel lucky that I grew up on a farm and so wasn’t afraid to pick him up, take him in, and keep him from getting attacked by other animals during the night. It’s been a fun experience and I hope he makes a full recovery so he can return to the wild and live a long and happy life! #sawwhetowl #birdrescue #birdwhisperer #owllove #owllover

Owl update: I just learned that the owl is probably a female and is recovering at the CHUV (Centre Hospitalier Universitaire Vétérinaire) in Saint-Hyacinthe. It seems to also have a fractured wing. I hope they can rehabilitate the poor thing! It was quite the experience having an owl in the house for one night. I’ve never seen a Northern Saw-whet owl before and now I think they are the cutest owls ever but they shouldn’t be on the streets of Montreal. Glad it’s getting great care at the animal hospital. #sawwhetowl #birdrescue #owllover #owllove

At the launch of the limited edition #FloraAdora @hendricksgin at @marcus_montreal on Monday where we were treated to four different cocktails made with this unique floral blend created by Hendrick’s gin (floral, raspberry and of course, juniper). My favourite was the Clover Club🍸. We also had an informative comparison tasting with the North American Hendrick’s ambassador @vtwiseguy where we sniffed and sipped the original Hendrick’s gin and Flora Adora (Neat, as in, straight up!) We left with a lovely floral bouquet to remind us of the flavours present in this unusual blend of gin that will surely inspire all you fellow gin lovers out there! (Media Invite) #hendricks #hendricksgin #hendricksfloraadora

Guess who went to see the #BarbieMovie today?! My niece and I just couldn’t decide on an outfit. Which one do you think we wore to the movie? 👯‍♀️ #HiBarbie #barbiecore #barbiefashion #barbiechallenge

Having a niece that’s just like you is the best. We spent the past 5 days shopping, playing dress-up and making memories. I only see her once a year so we make it count! #ilovebeinganauntie #auntieniece #twinningiswinning

A tribute to one of my favourite artists @maryamkeyhani 🧺👒When I saw this basket in my room at @relaisvillalina I immediately saw it as an upside-down hat because Maryam inspires one to see the fun in ordinary everyday things and that’s what makes her art, her outfits, her hats and headbands so so magical! 🪄✨

 #supersizethelook #strawhat #beachhat #maryamkeyhani

To make my favourite summer cocktail at home, @GrandMarnierOfficial sent me their #GrandMargarita cocktail kit shown here. What makes the Grand Margarita a more unique and elegant version of the classic margarita is the sophistication of the Grand Marnier ingredients: namely cognac and exotic bitter oranges. It’s so easy to elevate your margarita, simply add Grand Marnier! 

#Ad #Paid #Partner Please remember to always #drinkresponsibly #GrandEncounter

Creating more memories with my darling niece. Yesterday, we set up a vintage picnic in my parents’ backyard - complete with little finger sandwiches, mini desserts and homemade lemonade. Even though it was hot as heck, we had a lovely time. I’m enjoying every day that I get to spend with her! #fancypicnic #gardenpicnic #vintagepicnic

Had to make a prairie pit stop to take in the majestic canola fields! 🌾

Saskatchewan, #Saskatchewan #canolafields #prairiegirl #prairieproud

Following my evening with Grand Marnier for the #GrandEncounter event at Bar George at the end of June, I wanted to try recreating the experience at home for my friend Beatriz, who happens to be from Margarita Island, in Venezuela! Who else would be better to share a #GrandMargarita cocktail with? Elevate your next at-home cocktail with Grand Marnier! Here is the Grand Margarita recipe:

1.5 oz of tequila
1 oz of @grandmarnierofficial 
3/4 oz of fresh lime juice
1/2 oz of simple syrup

Shaken on ice in a cocktail shaker and served in a glass with a salted rim and garnished with a lime wheel. 

Of course Bea was able to discern the extraordinary flavours of the Grand Margarita over your average margarita. It’s the unique taste of a fine orange-infused cognac that makes all the difference. I hope this little experiment inspires you to try a Grand Margarita at home this summer! 

#ad #drinkresponsibly #grandmarnier

Two weeks in Saskatchewan spending quality time with my family. I can’t fit it all in a carousel but I was so happy to see my niece and nephew that I hadn’t seen since last summer and to catch up with aunties, cousins, uncles and my grandma who is almost 93! Plus, this trip was punctuated with my Mom’s big 70th birthday. The kids and I baked a lemon poppyseed cake for her special day. 🍰 #july2023 #familyisforever #niecelove #lovemynephew #prairiecarrie

Creating a little Italian cocktail with @malfygin to take me back to Italy without the jet lag or the heat wave! MALFY Gin Rosa is a citrusy-pink gin with a hint of grapefruit. It’s a lovely summer version of their original gin. Not only did the kind people at #malfygin send me a bottle to try, they also included a “Dolce Vita” care package complete with a beach bag, blanket, two large cocktail glasses and an instant camera. Since I was on vacation last week, I created their Amalfi Sunset Spritz which you can recreate at home using the following recipe:

35 ml of Malfy Gin Rosa
50 ml San Pellegrino Aranciata Rossa
50 ml Prosecco

Add the gin to a glass half full of ice, then add the Pellegrino & Prosecco, a slice of orange or grapefruit and a fresh sprig of thyme. Stir and serve! 
I guarantee it will remind you of Italian summers, even if you are only in your backyard! Cheers! 🍸🍸

(Gifted Product / Produit reçu) #malfymoment #cocktailrecipe #gincocktail #pinkgin

What I wanted to wear yesterday but I ended up swapping the skirt for shorts and the heels for sneakers because I was giving a shopping tour to a journalist from France and couldn’t possibly have walked three hours in these heels! 

Blouse: vintage (thrifted)
Bodysuit: @vitaeapparel (gifted)
Skirt: vintage Dolce&Gabbana (estate sale) 
Bag: Mansur Gavriel (from Holts)
Heels: YSL (from Holts) 

Outfit of yesterday, outfit of the day, career wear, all black outfit, polka dot blouse, bucket bag

Dapper and I went out for margaritas Saturday to celebrate the 75th anniversary of @cointreau - they sent me a lovely parcel with a passport to 5 Montreal venues that each offered their version of a Margarita made with Cointreau. Along with my friend and fellow cocktail lover, @marieeve.venne we tried some delicious margs at @maisonsaintpaul and @santosmontreal 🍹🍹 The experience inspired me to try my hand at making a watermelon Margarita at home using the cocktail kit that Cointreau sent me - check out my Stories for that recipe! (Media Invitation) 

#75yearsofthemargarita #cointreauchangeseverything #watermelonmargarita #cointreau #margaritamonday #mtlcocktailbar #mtlcocktails #mtlcocktail

Kicked off Montreal Pride Week tonight with @holtrenfrewogilvy at their #AffichezVotreFierté soirée. Saw so many fab friends all glammed up for PRIDE! There was a pink carpet, cocktails, a DJ, a drag performance, colourful artwork, makeup stations and a candy bar. I had so much fun! All the highlights in my Stories… Happy Pride Week, Montreal! 🌈💖 #fierté #mtlpride #pride2023

Ladies night! Tried the new @emmanuelleloungemtl with @suzwexler & @beagomez1301 - the food was good, but we didn’t love the cocktails. The vibe was oddly quiet for a Thursday, but we made it fun! Suzanne even found a secret disco bathroom that we all had to visit at the end of our soirée.🪩 Would we go back? Hmmmm… not likely. This is an honest review. Montreal has many other wonderful places to spend your hard-earned money! 

#mtlrestaurant #mtlbars #montrealnightlife

When you match the art and the artist… a few snaps from the @holtrenfrewogilvy GLAM SOCIAL HOUR in celebration of Montreal’s diversity. Saw a lot of old friends and made some new ones. Some even dressed alike! Hosted by @rainbow.drag and in partnership with @diaryofasocialgal - All photos by @danp514 (more on my blog)  #holtrenfrewogilvy #mtlpride #fiertemtl #pride2023 💖

I love how @greygoose always brings the flair of the South of France to Montreal! This time, the premium French vodka company set up a lawn bowling garden at the Old Port marina complete with a cocktail lounge where you can enjoy many versions of their summer spritz and nibble on savoury or sweet crepes prepared fresh for you. I went last night with my friends and soon discovered a new knack for “pétanque” (lawn bowling)!🎳You can reserve your spot on their website and enjoy the laid-back sport today-Sunday. (I attended through a Media Invitation). Enjoy these last days of summer! 🍸#greygooselawnclub #vivelavodka #greygoose #greygoosevodka #greygooselife

A slow, foggy morning on the mountain, followed by a coffee and croissant, is my favourite way to start the weekend. ☕️🥐🐕

#foggymorning #foggyweather #mistymorning #mountroyal #mountroyalpark #parcdumontroyal
Happy International Dog Day to all your favourite canines! #DapperSchnauzer #girlsbestfriend

Celebrated 75 years of the original margarita last night @riversidemtl with @cointreau - it started at 3pm and I was home by 6:30pm. That’s my kind of party! The DJ kept everyone on their feet and the margaritas were flowing. Cheers to these epic last days of summer🍹! 

(Invitation)
#cointreau #margaritatime #theoriginalmargarita

Come with me to the Amalfi coast! Just kidding! Last night, I celebrated with the deliciously citrusy pink Italian gin @malfygin Rosa which is now available in Quebec! It tastes great as a spritz with Prosecco or as a grapefruit-y negroni. Prolong your summer nights with a #malfyginrosa cocktail. (Media Invite) @barbellomtl #MalfyGin #BarBello #gincocktail #mtlcocktails
Happy birthday @marie.katura 🎈After 20 years of friendship, you still amaze me! 🫶🏻

location.city_name: Vogue Hotel Montreal Downtown, Curio Collection by Hilton

social_posts.post_text: Montreal is getting a new musical institution! Last night was the official launch of the @musiquemontrealmusic - a project initiated by the @trafalgarschoolforgirls and a committee devoted to bringing music to people of all ages and backgrounds, without hierarchy. A place where Montrealers can be both inspired by and educated through the art of music. The launch was held at @yamaresto at the @voguehotelmontreal thanks to the support of @chefantoniopark and included a performance by @alotabrott of the @fmcmontreal - if you’d like to support the initiative, or simply find out more, be sure to follow: @musiquemontrealmusic 🎵🎶(Media Invite) #classicalmusician #musiqueclassique #ecoledemusique #chambermusic

This is the face of someone who just got her first book advance! I am so excited to be writing a guidebook on Montreal, the city that I’ve called home for the past 23 years. I can’t wait to share my favourite haunts and recommendations in print. I also look forward to saying “go buy my book” when someone asks me to plan their visit to Montreal 😅 #montreallife #montrealer #mymontreal #mtlmoments

My favourite season is finally here! Time for boots and sweaters, falling leaves, pumpkins and chrysanthemums. This time last year, I chose orange for the garden but I’m wondering if I should go back to white mums? I also repaired Actaeon’s head last fall - do you remember when he was headless for awhile? I’m happy to say he hasn’t lost it since! #fallgarden #englishgarden #englishgardens

One of my favourite Montreal houses with an antique store on street level - Beverly Russell Antiques, 2204 Blvd de Maisonneuve West, Shaughnessy Village. #shaughnessyvillage #antiquestore #beverlyrussell #mtlarchitecture #mtlmoment

Hello October!🍂The month of chilly mornings in cozy sweaters, the changing leaves and hearty soups. (It’s also my bday month!) In celebration of the new month and new season, I switched out the plants in my little garden. I decided on these wonderful bright orangey-yellow chrysanthemums this year. What do you think? They just got them in on Friday at Home Depot and they were only $17.99 apiece. I think they’re gorgeous! And I managed to salvage the trailing ivy from the previous planter arrangements. 🧡  #chrysanthemum #chrysanthemums #fallgarden #fallgardens #carriescarriagehouse

My favourite doorway, all decked out for fall @trafalgarschoolforgirls - I wonder how many pumpkins are still standing there? This was last Thursday when they had their open house. I kind of wish I had a daughter because she would have a cool school just around the corner! 

#mtlmoments #mtlarchitecture #falldecorations #doorwaysoftheworld #scottishstyle #britishstyle

October’s house portrait. It’s been awhile since I posted a house pic! I’m actually really glad that it didn’t sell. I would’ve missed it. Sometimes life just decides things for you while you thought you had other plans. 

#carriescarriagehouse #carriagehouse #montrealhomes #mtlarchitecture

Happy Thanksgiving! I hope yours is full of friends and family, good food and gratitude. As I prepare for our annual “Friendsgiving” I reflect on the great bonds I’ve formed with my chosen family here in Montreal while I also recall past gatherings of my family in the Prairies. One day, we’ll create another type of Thanksgiving with my niece and nephew, I’m sure! Enjoy this fall tablescape from 2021 with little appearances from my trusty sidekick, Dapper. 🫶🏻🦃🍂🤎 

Table linens: @mezari_atelier 
Table settings: @megdoespottery 
Glassware: vintage (estate sale find)
Cutlery: vintage (estate sale find)
Florals: @marc_sardi 
Candles & candleholders: #MezariAtelier 

#thanksgiving2023 #falltable #falltablescape

This handsome fellow @dapperschnauzer is 10 today! I may be crazy, but he’s been the best fur companion a gal could ever dream of. My hiking sidekick, my confidant, my sometimes therapist… you bring me so much joy. I hope you live a long and healthy life. To many many more years, please! 🙏🏻 Pâté-croûte from @renoirmontreal 😋

#dapperschnauzer #dogsatthetable #dogsofmontreal #spoileddogs

Fall style with my new favourite coat (second hand Zara). Rest of the outfit: 

Blouse: vintage ysl rive-gauche 
Skirt: @uniqlocanada 
Boots: @aldo_shoes 
Bag: @wearshopclub (Montreal brand, gifted) 
Scarf: vintage Hermès (from @iegorencheres )

#fallfits #fallfinds #myvintagestyle

My 23rd birthday - Oct 26, 1995 @kronenhalle with my Swiss family for whom I was an Au Pair. I tried my first oyster! 

My 50th birthday - Oct 26, 2022 at the same restaurant in Zürich with the same Swiss family but this time, their son Florian joined us.

Bianca surprised me with a cake for breakfast on both birthdays! And last year, @florianfox.music sang Happy Birthday to me after dinner - all grown up now, he’s an incredible country music star and lawyer! 

So grateful for these sweet memories ☺️🦪🍰🎈

My very decadent birthday lunch @chezleveque1972 FUN FACT: The classy French restaurant on @laurierouest opened the same year I was born! You can try their special menu (a five-course meal for only $83) during @mtlatable from Nov 3-19 or even their late-night or lunch menus for only $29. I especially loved their new lobster ravioli, the endive salad with pecans and the hangar steak with shallot sauce. Be sure to visit the washrooms for the out-of-the-ordinary music. The name Lévêque is the owners surname but comes from the old French word for “Bishop” - hence the churchy-WC music. Un gros merci à Patricia Lévêque pour l’inoubliable dîner ! 🥂🍽️🍷🍨 

#chezleveque #mtlàtable #mtlatable #laurierouest

So whatever’s the opposite of a Buddhist that’s what I am.

Kindhearted, yes, but knee deep in existential gloom,

except when the fog smokes the bridges like this—

like, instead of being afraid we might juice ourselves up,

eh, like, might get kissed again? Dwelling in bones I go straight

through life, a sublime abundance—cherries, dog’s breath, the sun, then

(ouch) & all of us snuffed out. Dear one, what is waiting for us tonight,

nostalgia? the homes of childhood? oblivion? How we hate to go—

*

Sundays I spend feeling sorry for myself I’ve got a

knack for it I’m morbid, make the worst of any season

exclamation point  yet levity’s a liquor of sorts,

lowers us through life toward the terminus soon

extinguished  darling, the comfort is slight,

tucked in bed we search each other for some alternative—

oh let’s marvel at the world, the stroke and colors of it

now, while breathing.

Skeletons 💀
By Deborah Landau
(From the New Yorker)

It’s been a long, long time since I’ve posted anything. Thought I’d share this monochrome look that I wore to the symphony on Sunday. I love this @jw_anderson x @uniqlo squirrel sweater so much that I ordered one for my niece so we can be sweater twins! 🐿️🐿️
Outfit details:
Sweater: @uniqlocanada (bought, not gifted)
Skirt: vintage Escada (Estate sale find)
Suede boots: @brownsshoes 
Coat: Zara
Scarf: @holtrenfrewogilvy (purchased 6yrs ago)
Beret: @canadian_hat 

#uniqlocanada #lifewear #uniqlolifewear #uniqlosweater #squirrellove #squirrelsweater

Pretending to work from my favourite cafe. The one where everyone knows my name - Cafe Titanic in Old Montreal. Coffee by Sam, photos by a close friend. This place has been around for over 25 years! 

#oldmontreal #mtlcafe #mtlcafecrawl

It’s rare that I get excited for a car, but my new neighbour has been parking this sweet little vintage mini outside our castle and it’s just such a vibe! 

#vintagemini #classiccarspotting #austinmini #austinmartin #minicars

Scorpio season was on fire this year! Multiple celebrations were held — this being one of them. Birthday night at @bardominion (formerly the Dominion Square Tavern) with some of my dearest friends. The cocktails didn’t disappoint and the seafood platter is impressive. Thanks to my lovely pals for making it so memorable! #bardominion #mtlbars #seafoodbar

So happy that this historic space is open again! @bardominion always felt like stepping back in time with its vintage Canadian decor. Now more of a bar than a tavern, it’s still a cool spot for a fun night out in the heart of Montreal. The menu is mainly seafood but there are lovely snacks like devilled eggs and caviar or anchovy toast. The cocktail menu is a judiciously limited selection of elevated classics. I particularly liked their Tuxedo martini and Manhattan. They don’t normally take reservations but made an exception since we were a group of 8. It was a birthday to remember! #bardominion #dominionsquaretavern #mtlbar #mtlbars

Black Friday? Just my all-black outfit for last year’s holiday dinner party. I’ve decided that I’m not spending a dime on a new outfit or anything else this Black Friday. I’ve received a ton of emails with amazing “deals” but the best way to save $ is just not to spend. This outfit is completely vintage / second hand and I’ll probably wear something vintage or second hand again this year. It’s still not WHAT you wear, but HOW you wear it! Will you be buying anything today? Do you really need to? 

#holidayoutfit #holidayoutfits #holidaystyle #holidaystyleinspo

Treat your loved ones to a spectacular series of large-scale classical music concerts by incredible Canadian and Quebec talent this holiday season. The @festivalclassica just launched Les Grands Accords Classica - a series of 5 exceptional concerts that will be held in Spring 2024 at one of two of the largest concert halls in the greater Montreal area. Not only are the Grands Accords tickets and passports affordable and unique holiday gift ideas, but the grand-scale concerts will certainly be the most wonderful opportunity to dress up for the occasion! I put together a glamorous outfit that I would wear to any one of the 5 concerts in the Grands Accords series, but I was particularly inspired by “Les amoureuses de Mozart” (Mozart’s Lovers) to create this look. Four of the five Grands Accords concerts will be held at the Claude-Champagne hall in Outremont, making them quite easily accessible and close to some of the best restaurants and bars for a pre-concert nosh or cocktail. Who’s joining me?!

#lesgrandsaccords #FestivalClassica #HolidayGiftIdeas

Hung my wreaths and put the little🌲🌲🌲🌲in the garden planters yesterday. I used to buy them at the market but the prices went way up and then I found out that @bosapin_livraison charges way less, plus they deliver! Saved me the headache of going to find them and transporting them (pine needles everywhere!) Now I just need to find an electrician to install an outdoor plugin because battery-operated outdoor lights always end up rusting or malfunctioning. Happy almost December! 😁 

#christmaswreaths #outdoorchristmasdecor #littlechristmastree #christmasgarden

An exquisite cheese board should include a variety of cheese with a surprising mix of flavours and textures to impress your guests. Be sure to include some specialties from Europe, like a fine mountain cheese such as a French Comté or an Austrian Voralberg. Add a soft cheese like Brie or Camembert and something sharp like a blue d’Auvergne or a Mimolette. Trust me, your guests won’t soon forget these! The @fromages.europe.cheeses inspired me to create a cheese board using a mix of European cheeses and some of my favourite things to pair them with. Here’s a fun idea for the holidays: ask your guests to each bring a unique cheese. Set up your boards with all the fixings and ready-to-label cheese markers. It’s a fun way to discover a lot of cheese and a great ice-breaker to have guests describe the one they brought.

🧀

Un plateau de fromages vraiment exquis doit comprendre une variété de fromages avec un mélange surprenant de saveurs et de textures pour impressionner vos invités. N’oubliez pas d’inclure quelques spécialités européennes, comme un fromage de montagne raffiné tel que le Comté français ou le Voralberg autrichien. Ajoutez à cela un fromage à pâte molle comme le brie ou le camembert et n’oubliez pas d’ajouter un fromage à pâte piquante comme un bleu d’Auvergne ou une Mimolette. Croyez-moi, ce sont des fromages que vos invités n’oublieront pas! Je me suis associée aux #FromagesEurope pour créer un plateau de fromages à partir d’un mélange de fromages européens et de certains de mes produits préférés. Essayez cette idée pendant les Fêtes : demandez à vos proches d’apporter un fromage unique. Préparez vos plateaux de fromages avec tous les ingrédients nécessaires et des marqueurs de fromages prêts à être étiquetés. C’est un excellent moyen de briser la glace et d’inciter vos invités à expliquer pourquoi ils ont choisi tel ou tel fromage.

#Pub #EuropeFullOfCharacter #EuropePleineDeCaractère
#EuropeFromage #EnjoyitsfromEurope @hopscotch_sopexa_canada

Throwback to last year when I was stringing popcorn and dried orange slices for a holiday photo which this lovely platform removed without giving sufficient reason. It may have been because I mentioned that this was an activity I would do during the holidays when I was young. And apparently you can’t mix childhood memories with spirits! I still love the photos and still know that the men in my life (Father, brother especially) would not be disappointed to receive one of these bottles as a gift! Let’s see if my more vague sentiments will be deemed appropriate this time around!

Earlier this week, I found someone to install an outdoor electrical outlet so that I could finally plug some Christmas lights in!🎄🎄🎄🎄 Thanks @therealevethomas for suggesting @taskrabbit for these little things that otherwise would never get done! 

#christmasgarden #outdoorlights #miniaturetrees #carriescarriagehouse

A couple of weeks ago, I posted a video of a glamorous outfit to wear to any one of the @festivalclassica Grands Accords concerts in 2024. Tickets for the series of large-scale concerts are on sale and make a fabulous gift for any music lover in your life, this holiday season. Individual tickets and passports to the concerts can be purchased online and each concert will feature hundreds of nationally and internationally renowned musicians. With the experience taking place in some of the most impressive concert halls in the city, what better occasion to get dressed up for an evening of exquisite culture?! 
 
I’ve partnered with Festival Classica to offer you and your loved ones the chance to win a pair of tickets for Les Grands accords Classica series! To participate, be sure to follow both me and @festivalclassica and leave a comment on Festival Classica’s ticket contest post and tell us which concert you want to see! Festival Classica will select the lucky winner just in time for the holidays! You can tag as many people as possible because one tag = one more chance to win! Bonne chance !
 
 
#lesgrandsaccords #FestivalClassica #HolidayGiftIdeas #pub

A little vintage Christmas look that I wore to the opening of the Christmas market at Place des Festivals two weeks ago. Wearing my MacPherson family jewels and tartan collar designed by @charlottehosten for me many years ago! 

Outfit details:
Custom collar: @charlottehosten (now an interior designer) 
Blouse: @pink_tartan 
Skirt: vintage Escada 
Shoes: YSL
Earrings: vintage MacPherson crest 

#myvintagestyle #thriftedskirt #estatesalefinds #macphersontartan

Are you ready for Christmas? I’m nowhere near ready but I was happy to find the time to have brunch with my favourite Santa at the @renoirmontreal this morning. The full French brunch experience is every Sunday from 11am-3pm and it’s total divine decadence! I had a perfect omelette prepared in front of me by sous-chef @felix.duquet and of course I had a slice of his award-winning Pâté-croûte (Felix recently won the North American championship)! The array of desserts were all irresistible and the team even brought me a mini version of their delicious Yule Log.🪵You can still order yours in time for Christmas! Thanks @chefperret and the @sofitelmontreal team for the unforgettable brunch! 

(Media Invite) #mtlatable #montrealrestaurant #sofitelmontreal #mtlbrunch

At this time of year, I tend to order a Manhattan because I think it looks Christmasy! So when @angelsenvy said they wanted to send me a parcel, I ordered all the other ingredients to make my favourite bourbon cocktail. This port-cask finished bourbon whiskey is one of the best there is. It makes for a delicious Manhattan or simply as a great after-dinner drink on its own. What cocktails will you be serving this weekend?

To make a Manhattan:
2oz Angel’s Envy bourbon (Gifted Product)
1oz red vermouth 
3 drops of Angostura bitters
Stir on ice / strain into a coupe
Garnish with black cherries🍒
Enjoy responsibly 🥃

Coupes: vintage 
Styling Tip: tie a ribbon on the stem 🎀
Mixing glass, bitters, cherries & cocktail picks: @alambika 

#angelsenvy #bourbonwhiskey #bourboncocktails #manhattancocktail

Afternoon tea on a vintage train? At @exporail_qc_canada you can do just that around Christmas time! Today was the first day but you can still book a spot over the holidays. The train museum is the largest in Canada and it’s very cool to see all the unique train cars that have been saved and restored by the museum and its donors. Afternoon tea is served in a train car from 1898 that belonged to former Grand Trunk Railway President, Charles Melville Hays. It’s quite magical! 🚂☕️🫖 Expo Rail is located in Saint-Constant (not terribly far from Montreal) -Media Invite 

#christmastrain #christmasteatime #holidaytea #exporail #explorequebec #quebecoriginal

The quiet time between Christmas and New Years is one of my favourite moments. A time to pause, reset and reflect. Fortunately, I have my trusty companion who goes through all of life’s ups and downs with me. We went for a long, misty walk on the mountain this morning. Aside from a handful of dedicated joggers, we barely saw a soul. It was a peaceful, meditative walk with plenty of time to think back on the year past and I came back with renewed hope for a kinder and more gentle new year. Wishing you all moments like these! 

#mtroyal #mtroyalmoment #mistymorning #foggyday

Happy New Year’s Eve! This is the outfit I plan to wear, even though I’m not going out. My favourite way to spend NYE is quietly, at home, with good food and wine. And I may or may not make it to midnight! This look features some festive jewellery from the latest @bymademoisellejules collection (Thank you, Julie! @mademoisellejules ✨🌟✨) I think it’s the best one yet. All of her pieces are glamorous and easy to mix and match. Hope you 💍 in the New Year in your own fabulous way! 🥂✨

Outfit details:
Vintage blazer (from a consignment shop in🇨🇭)
Vintage leggings (gifted from a🇨🇭friend)
Heels Zara
Earrings, necklace (worn as a bracelet) and star ring, all from @bymademoisellejules (gifted) 
Clutch (purchased in a Saskatoon boutique many, many years ago!)💖

#nye2023 #newyearseveoutfit #bijouxaddict

A weekend away always does a body good! I spent the past weekend in Saint-Donat with good friends, good food and good skiing! Getting out of the city during winter always makes a huge difference to my mental health. I know not everyone gets the chance to get away and I’m conscious that I am very fortunate to have friends who can treat me to a weekend of indulgence. This is my gratitude post for a mini escape from life’s everyday responsibilities, worries and stress. If you are looking to go skiing this winter, @skigarceau is an affordable and charming ski resort for beginners, groups of friends and families. Plus, the view from the summit is breathtaking!🎿

#lanaudiere #stdonat #saintdonat #skigarceau

In the mood for snow. Tonight’s dog walk was brief but beautiful. #carriescarriagehouse 

#montreal #snowstorm #cotedesneiges #mtlwinter
